blog.name: team-downey-1965
blog.title: RDJ FAN PAGE!!! TEAM DOWNEY!!!
blog.description: My old account (team-downey1965 ) closed. This my new account.

summary: "He’s so great. I can’t say enough about him, I really can’t. I didn’t know what to expect going in to work with him. He’s so...
body:
“He’s so great. I can’t say enough about him, I really can’t. I didn’t know what to expect going in to work with him. He’s so talented and he’s got so much charisma and persona. I can honestly say, of all the movie stars I’ve worked with, he’s the one that when he comes on set, you really feel like, ‘Man — this guy’s a movie star!’ You just feel it. When he comes in a room he just owns the oxygen.”

Chris Evans on Robert Downey Jr.

reblog.comment:

I can honestly say, of all the movie stars I’ve worked with, he’s the one that when he comes on set, you really feel like, ‘Man — this guy’s a movie star!’ You just feel it. When he comes in a room he just owns the oxygen.”

Chris Evans on Robert Downey Jr.

I can honestly say, of all the movie stars I’ve worked with, he’s the one that when he comes on set, you really feel like, ‘Man — this guy’s a movie star!’ You just feel it. When he comes in a room he just owns the oxygen.”

Chris Evans on Robert Downey Jr.
trail.content:
“He’s so great. I can’t say enough about him, I really can’t. I didn’t know what to expect going in to work with him. He’s so talented and he’s got so much charisma and persona. I can honestly say, of all the movie stars I’ve worked with, he’s the one that when he comes on set, you really feel like, ‘Man — this guy’s a movie star!’ You just feel it. When he comes in a room he just owns the oxygen.”

Chris Evans on Robert Downey Jr.

blog.name: fictional-downey
blog.title: Fictional Downey
blog.description: Hi! Welcome to my Robert Downey Jr. fanfiction blog! I'm a HUGE fan of RDJ (and not just since he took on the role of Iron Man I've loved him for YEARS). Yes, I know there is TONS of fanfiction out there and mine isn't anything special, but I'm posting anyway ;-). I'll post chapter by chapter, BUT also have all the finished chapters posted under the "The Stories" link below. Feedback is appreciated - even POLITE criticism. Have fun (and yes, there are ADULT chapters)!

summary: T’Challa: You’re plan is flawed, Stark.  Tony: Why? Because you don’t like it?  Steve: He’s right, Tony. If you lose power out...
caption:
T’Challa: You’re plan is flawed, Stark. 
Tony: Why? Because you don’t like it? 
Steve: He’s right, Tony. If you lose power out there you’ll be a sitting duck.

Marvel’s Avengers Black Panther’s Quest 5x21

summary: I was watching a load of Gordon Ramsey vids on YouTube, cause that's what you do when it's 4:00 AM and you're hungry and this...
body:
I was watching a load of Gordon Ramsey vids on YouTube, cause that’s what you do when it’s 4:00 AM and you’re hungry and this came to mind:


Kitchen nightmares Stony AU with Tony Stark as the world renowned chef, and Steve as the struggling owner of a classic American diner.

Of course, at some point they fall in love.

summary: Tony Stark and the bots (plus Peter) reacting to Opportunity would just be a lot (campaign to have Tony rescue Opportunity 2k19)
question: Tony Stark and the bots (plus Peter) reacting to Opportunity would just be a lot (campaign to have Tony rescue Opportunity 2k19)
answer:
RIGHT

- Peter would ofc be crying,

- “Mr. Stark Oppy sang happy birthday to herself she didn’t deserve this”

- Peter also hugging Dum-E and U with every bit of intensity in his small body as they beep sadly

- “She said it was getting DARK WE HAVE TO DO SOMETHING”

- Tony just sighing and immediately sending a specialized suit to retrieve Oppy

- And if anyone asked it wasn’t because his son intern was so upset. He simply wanted to see how Oppy survived longer than her intended time. That’s all.

caption:

title: Watching Ultron
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EwTNHk

by NUMBER1ANGIRL

After the Avengers watch Infinity War, they are ready to start End Game!!!

Unforunately, Tony took the only DVD Player they could use to get repaired earlier that day. Now, boredom has taken hold of the world’s (and galaxy’s) greatest heroes, causing them to resort to watch a movie that half the assembled have only ever heard passing remarks made on the news…

Words: 1217, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of The Movie

title: When Love Takes You In
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2VpdKFP

by unknownbananna

The boys who saved Tony Stark’s life lose everything but find each other. When they in turn are found and rescued, they, alongside their former mentor now foster father, have the chance to regain what they thought they’d lost forever: A family and a home.

(Inspired by headcanons from agib-2002’s tumblr.)

Words: 1366, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Harley Keener, Peter Parker, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Harley Keener & Tony Stark, Harley Keener & Peter Parker, Harley Keener & Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Foster Care, Adoption, Adopted Sibling Relationship, Parent Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Verbal Abuse, Everyone Needs Therapy, happy endings, unfair depictions of the foster care system, No really most foster parents are wonderful, (Peter and Harley’s are not)

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Then We Shall Raise Hell
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2SqFoju

by I_Got_Lost

Bucky Barnes woke up from the ice and found out that the world moved on without him.
The good news is that he can technically marry his husband! Go Canada!
The bad news?
Ollie was still dead.
And now, instead of the peaceful happy ending Ollie had teased him about for years, he was having to face the fact that the Norse gods are real, aliens exist, and apparently Howard had a son. He wasn’t sure which one of the three was the weirdest to wrap his head around.
But, either way, ghost are coming out of the woodwork, secrets can’t seem to stay buried, and this is starting to become one hell of an adjustment period.
Twenty-one years old, and he still can’t drink.

Words: 2027, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Please Tell Me You Have a Plan?

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Avengers: Earth’s Mightiest Heroes, Captain America - All Media Types, Captain America (Movies), Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Incredible Hulk (TV), The Incredible Hulk (2008), Hulk- All Media Types, Hawkeye- All Media Types, Thor (Movies), X-Men - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Gen, M/M

by I_Got_Lost

Bucky Barnes woke up from the ice and found out that the world moved on without him.
The good news is that he can technically marry his husband! Go Canada!
The bad news?
Ollie was still dead.
And now, instead of the peaceful happy ending Ollie had teased him about for years, he was having to face the fact that the Norse gods are real, aliens exist, and apparently Howard had a son. He wasn’t sure which one of the three was the weirdest to wrap his head around.
But, either way, ghost are coming out of the woodwork, secrets can’t seem to stay buried, and this is starting to become one hell of an adjustment period.
Twenty-one years old, and he still can’t drink.
